Can we actually quantify decentralization? Balaji Srinivasan, CEO & Co-founder of 21.co, a company that allows you to replace your public email with an inbox that pays you, makes an attempt to quantify the distribution of value in decentralized systems.

Quantifying Decentralization, Blockstack Summit 2017

Source: Quantifying Decentralization by Balaji Srinivasan, Blockstack Summit 2017
